INSERT INTO spider_config ( spider_name, spider_type, url, request_param, content, rule_engine, target_out, out_table_name, base_url, scan_expressions, item_rules, scheduled_cron, deep_num, state, spider_num, last_spider_time, remark, sort, create_pin, update_pin, yn, create_time, update_time, ts ) VALUES
( #{item.spiderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.spiderType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.requestParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ruleEngine,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.targetOut,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.outTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.baseUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.scanExpressions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemRules,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.scheduledCron,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.deepNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.spiderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lastSpiderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createPin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updatePin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.yn,jdbcType=TINYINT}, now(), now(), now() )
mapper.update:
UPDATE spider_config
spider_name = #{spiderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spider_type = #{spiderType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_param = #{requestParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule_engine = #{ruleEngine,jdbcType=TINYINT},
target_out = #{targetOut,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_table_name = #{outTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
base_url = #{baseUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scan_expressions = #{scanExpressions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_rules = #{itemRules,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scheduled_cron = #{scheduledCron,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deep_num = #{deepNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
spider_num = #{spiderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_spider_time = #{lastSpiderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_pin = #{createPin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_pin = #{updatePin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yn = #{yn,jdbcType=TINYINT},
sys_version = sys_version + 1, update_time =now(), ts=now()
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
